alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 3:51AM EST until December 13 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Jefferson county. The greater snow accumulations will be restricted to the higher terrain of the Tug Hill Plateau, with accumulations an inch or less for lower elevation areas, including Watertown and Fort Drum. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 3 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Lake effect snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
